resource.string: Query or modify the value of IMSI.

Usage:
{}$ {} [set=iccid]
Example: - iccid Original ICCID: 89860009191190000108 (98 68 00 90 91 11 09 00 10 80)
- iccid set=1234 Original ICCID: 89860009191190000108 (98 68 00 90 91 11 09 00 10 80) Updated ICCID: 12340009191190000108 (21 43 00 90 91 11 09 00 10 80)
PS. The 'ICCID' is using Luhn algorithm, please refer https://planetcalc.com/2464/
